about.title: About ArInSol
about.description:
Arinsol is a small team of experienced builders working at the intersection of engineering, process design, and product execution. We turn agentic AI into professional-grade systems that organizations can rely on—systems that respect rules, handle messy reality, and deliver outcomes you can measure.
We care about accuracy because we build for environments where mistakes are expensive: regulated work, audit trails, customer-facing accountability, and multi-handover delivery.  Our systems are designed for traceability, reviewability, and human oversight so AI becomes a trusted capability, not a risky experiment.

caseStudies.title: AI-Native Systems Built for Business-Critical Work
caseStudies.subText: Three specialized platforms designed to manage audits, operations, and organizational knowledge. Grounded in your data, engineered for trust, and measured by operational impact.

items.title: 1. ARinAudit: Professional-Grade Assurance
items.description: AI-native audit execution specifically engineered for the complexities of SME audits. ARinAudit replaces static, Excel-driven files with a risk-based execution system. It structures every engagement into a continuous, four-stage workflow—Engagement, Risk Assessment, Execution, and Completion—ensuring every conclusion is backed by evidence.
features: Risk-Driven Planning: Automatically links risks and assertions to specific procedures and evidence, creating a review-ready audit trail.
Defensible Documentation: Every answer and workpaper includes clear citations to standards, methodologies, and source evidence.
Governance & Oversight: Features built-in Auditor-in-Charge review gates, approval workflows, and detailed audit logs to ensure full compliance.
Efficiency Gains: Designed to unlock multi-fold productivity improvements in regulated environments without sacrificing professional skepticism.

items.title: 2. ARinProcess: The Project & Handover Operating System
items.description: Eliminate bottlenecks and gain total visibility over workflow-heavy project environments. ARinProcess automates project lifecycles at the point where delays actually happen: the handover. By tracking work at the subtask level, it makes delivery measurable and predictable.
features: Intelligent Automation: Features automated project creation based on defined templates and multi-stage flows.
Precision Tracking: Tracks subtask-level progression with timestamps, owners, and complete handover histories to eliminate "hidden" delays.
Visual Portfolio Management: A map-first view allows you to see the real-time status of all projects across your entire portfolio instantly.
Administrative Efficiency: Includes one-click document generation from structured data and workflow-driven billing triggers to protect on-time invoicing.
Escalation Visibility: Never lose a follow-up with automatic subtask delay tracking and clear escalation paths.

items.title: 3. ARinChat: Citation-Backed Knowledge Access
items.description: Turn scattered organizational knowledge into a reliable, professional-grade internal "Source of Truth." ARinChat transforms fragmented policies, procedures, spreadsheets, and transcripts into clear answers. It is built for high-stakes environments—like banking and government—where accuracy and traceability are non-negotiable.
features: Verified Accuracy: Every response is citation-backed, allowing users to verify information at the original source immediately.
Information Integrity: Automatically detects and highlights outdated or conflicting information across your knowledge base.
Flexible Deployment: Available in lightweight "use-case editions" scoped to specific themes or document sets for rapid implementation.
Unified Support: Scalable for both internal team onboarding and external customer inquiries, all while respecting permission-aware governance.

faq.title: Operational Excellence: Everything You Need to Know
faq.subText: Understand our approach to implementation, data integrity, and professional-grade AI.

items.question: 1. Onboarding & Implementation
items.answer:
We prioritize speed and measurable value over long discovery cycles.
• Zero Technical Barrier: No technical background is required to deploy our tools. We focus on configuring the system to match your specific operational reality.
• Rapid Deployment: We typically begin with a brief scoping call to confirm product fit, followed by a demo or pilot tailored to your use case.
• Integration over Replacement: ARINSOL is designed to complement your existing toolset, reducing reliance on fragmented spreadsheets and manual follow-ups. We only simplify your tool stack where it leads to a cleaner operational flow.
• A Proven Path to Scale: Our implementation process includes success metric confirmation, role-based configuration, onboarding, and a pilot run with real-world cases before a full rollout. We encourage a "pilot-first" approach to prove value before scaling.

items.question: 2. Data Integrity & Security
items.answer:
In professional environments, trust is built on privacy and transparency.
• Confidentiality by Default: Your data is treated as strictly confidential and used only to deliver your specific service. We do not use customer data to train public AI models.
• Privacy by Design: Our deployments include robust access controls, detailed audit logs, and governance structures designed to support your GDPR and compliance obligations.
• Permission-Aware Access: For sensitive tools like ARinAudit and ARinChat, we provide granular permissions so users only see authorized information, with fully auditable usage patterns.
• Flexible Hosting: We offer various deployment options, including hosted or private environments, depending on your organization’s security constraints.

items.question: 3. Solution-Specific Insights
items.answer:
ARinChat: The Trustworthy Knowledge Base
• Eliminating Hallucinations: Answers are generated strictly from your approved source material and include direct citations for verification.
• Handling Complexity: It is designed for "messy" or evolving data, highlighting conflicts or missing information rather than inventing answers.
• Versatile Application: Can be deployed internally for team onboarding or externally to provide customers with consistent, permission-aware support.
ARinAudit: Professional-Grade Assurance
• ISA-Aligned Workflow: Built around risk-based planning and evidence-based conclusions, covering everything from engagement to completion.
• Enhanced Oversight: Replaces static templates with an AI-native system that supports review gates, approvals, and professional skepticism under human control.
• Defensible Results: Delivers a consistent, inspection-ready audit file with significantly reduced manual drafting cycles.
ARinProcess: Operational Discipline
• Task-Level Visibility: Eliminates hidden delays by tracking projects at the subtask level, ensuring seamless handovers and billing discipline.
• Industry Agility: While proven in surveying, the system is engineered for any workflow-heavy environment, including construction, architecture, and civil engineering.

items.question: 4. Is ARINSOL the Right Fit?
items.answer:
We believe in direct communication to save our clients time.
A Good Fit If You Want:
• A proven, high-speed system you can adopt quickly.
• Measurable gains in speed, consistency, and traceability.
• To reduce rework, searching, and manual handovers.
Not a Fit If You Need:
• A fully custom-built platform designed from scratch.
• A long discovery and consulting engagement before delivery.
• An open-ended software agency for bespoke projects.
